Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Heart Container#.
